title: 820-00875-a
message:
First time seeing one of these boards. LCD backlight looks like half the led's are off. no sign of water damage or physical damage. do you think its an lcd or logic board issue? And could anyone share the boardview?

[URL]https://imgur.com/a/1xa62Ar[/URL]

title: 820-00875-a
message: LED return lines are inside LCD so this is LCD issue. See if Apple wants to help before messing with Chinese junk.

title: 820-00875-a
message: Thanks for the hlep duke!  and no worries, I have a supplier that deals with a/b stock parts only. ill just order the screen.
